org.usfirst.frc.team302.robot.subsystems

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team302.robot.subsystems.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to find the vision targets on the goals

    Change Log:

    Version:
    version 1: 2/27/2016 -- Derek Witcpalek

    Initial working class with the ability to find good targets at 18 feet and return the x and y coordinates of the good target

    Author:
    Derek
